name: Hidden Mysteries: Salem Secrets - Witch Trials of 1692
name_original: Hidden Mysteries: Salem Secrets - Witch Trials of 1692
description:
Hidden Mysteries: Salem Secrets - Witch Trials of 1692 is a game developed by Gunnar Games. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by GameMill Entertainment.
Hidden Mysteries: Salem Secrets - Witch Trials of 1692 is available on PC.
